Committee on Vaccination 
and Immunisation (JCVI) has 
identified	pregnant	women	
as a vulnerable group within 
the COVID-19 vaccination 
programme. Pregnant women 
are at higher risk of becoming 
unwell with COVID-19 if they 
have an underlying health 
condition such as immune 
problems, diabetes, high blood
pressure or asthma; are living 
with overweight or obesity; are
